A collection of over 250+ apps from Nirsoft. sysinternals - The Sysinternals suite from Microsoft. java - A collection of Java development kits (JDKs) and Java runtime engines (JREs), Javaâ€™s virtual machine debugging tools and Java based runtime engines. nonportable -
